name: Abaddon
details: Increases Borrowed Time duration from 4 / 5 / 6 to 5 / 6 / 7
Redirects 50% of all damage dealt to nearby allied heroes to Abaddon when he is within 900 range

name: Alchemist
details: Can cast Aghanim's Scepter to directly grant any allied hero all Aghanim's Scepter bonuses as a permanent buff
The buff applies both the hero upgrade and the stat upgrade, and the scepter is consumed in the process
Multiple instances of this buff do not stack, and Alchemist can target himself as well
This is independent from Chemical Rage and will always be active, has 600 cast range

name: Ancient Apparition
details: Increases Ice Blast duration from 8 / 9 / 10 to 17

name: Anti-Mage
details: Causes Spell Shield to passively block and reflect a targeted spell once every 12 seconds

name: Axe
details: Causes Battle Hunger to reduce enemy total damage output by 30%
Applies Battle Hunger on enemy heroes within a 700 AoE after a successful Culling Blade

name: Bane
details: Causes Brain Sap to have a 1.5 second cooldown. Pierces Spell Immunity

name: Batrider
details: Flaming Lasso grabs a secondary target within 400 range nearest to the primary target, with the secondary target tethered to the first
Flaming Lasso now deals 100 damage per second

name: Beastmaster
details: Increases Primal Roar cast range from 600 to 950
Decreases cooldown from 80 / 75 / 70 to 45

name: Bloodseeker
details: Grants 2 charges to Rupture with a 40 second replenish time per charge

name: Bounty Hunter
details: Allows Shuriken Toss to bounce twice on each hero (bounces on everyone once, then bounces through each one again)
Increases ministun duration from 0.1 to 0.75

name: Brewmaster
details: Grants Earth Thunder Clap, Storm Drunken Haze, and Fire Drunken Brawler to Primal Spirits
The skills are applied at Brewmaster's current level, and the cooldowns are independent of the original Brewmaster

name: Bristleback
details: Viscous Nasal Goo is no longer targeted, and instead it applies Goo to all enemies around in a 750 radius when cast

name: Centaur Warrunner
details: Reduces all incoming damage by 40% and allows allies to run through obstructions
Can run through trees, cliffs, etc. Destroys trees.

name: Chaos Knight
details: Reduces cooldown by 20 seconds and allows Phantoms to be cast on an allied hero
1200 Cast Range

name: Chen
details: Allows Holy Persuasion to target Ancient Creeps
Increases the maximum number of controllable ancients by 1 / 2 / 3

name: Clockwerk
details: Decreases Hookshot cooldown from 70 / 55 / 40 to 12

name: Crystal Maiden
details: Applies Frostbite to any unit that has been standing in the Freezing Field for over 2.5 seconds

name: Dark Seer
details: Increases Wall of Replica illusion damage from 60% / 75% / 90% to 100% / 120% / 140%

name: Dazzle
details: Causes Shallow Grave to be a 450 AoE spell

name: Disruptor
details: Increases Static Storm duration from 5 to 7
Applies Mute

name: Doom
details: Increases Doom duration from 15 to 16
Doom spell duration doesn't count down while the target is within 900 range of Doom  Applies Break to the target

name: Drow Ranger
details: Marksmanship now causes her attacks to splinter on the target and split into two arrows affecting two random units in a 375 radius
The splintered arrows deal 50% damage each, the primary target still takes full damage
The split arrows act as normal attacks, carrying all attack modifiers

name: Earth Spirit
details: Grants the Enchant Remnant ability
Allows Earth Spirit to convert an enemy hero into a Stone Remnant for 3 seconds

name: Earthshaker
details: Enchant Totem becomes a 900 range ground target ability
Causes you to jump in the air and land at the target spot, casting enchant totem there

name: Elder Titan
details: Units that are pulled in by Earth Splitter will be disarmed in addition to being slowed
Slow/disarm duration increased from 3 / 4 / 5 to 4 / 5 / 6

name: Enchantress
details: Increases Impetus attack range from 550 to 740

name: Enigma
details: Adds the current level of Midnight Pulse damage to Black Hole
Stacks with Midnight Pulse

name: Faceless Void
details: Decreases  Chronosphere cooldown from 120 / 110 / 100 to 60

name: Gyrocopter
details: Adds a Side Gunner, which automatically fires an attack at random enemy units within 600 range every 1.1 seconds

name: Huskar
details: Increases Life Break damage from 34% / 38% / 42% to 65% of HP
Decreases cooldown from 12 to 4

name: Invoker
details: Adds one level to the stats provided by Quas, Wex, and Exort on all Invoked spells
Decreases cooldown from 6 to 2
Decreases mana cost from 60 to 0

name: Jakiro
details: Increases Macropyre distance from 1400 to 1800
Increases damage per second from 100 / 140 / 180 to 125 / 175 / 225
Increases duration from 10 to 30

name: Juggernaut
details: Increases number of Omnislash attacks from 3 / 6 / 9 to 6 / 9 / 12
Decreases cooldown from 130 / 120 / 110 to 70

name: Keeper of the Light
details: Increases Spirit Form duration from 40 to Permanent (Passive)
Grants Keeper of the Light flying vision during the day
During the day, Illuminate heals allies for 100% of the damage value

name: Kunkka
details: Ghostship now drags enemies within a 200 radius of it towards the crash site
It now starts from where Kunkka is, rather than behind him, landing in the same position it normally would have

name: Legion Commander
details: Increases Duel duration from 4 / 4.75 / 5.5 to 6 / 7 / 8
Legion Commander and the duel target gain 100% damage resistance to non-duelists
Grants Spell Immunity to Legion Commander during Duel

name: Leshrac
details: While Pulse Nova is active, every 1.75 seconds Lightning Storm will hit one random unit within 750 AoE (Prioritizes heroes)

name: Lich
details: Increases damage from 280 / 370 / 460 to 370 / 460 / 550
Increases cast range from 750 to 850  Increases bounces from 10 to Unlimited
Increases movement slow from 30% to 50% and attack slow from 30 to 50

name: Lifestealer
details: Grants the Assimilate ability
Allows Lifestealer to target an allied hero and swallow them to hide inside of Lifestealer
Any healing Lifestealer receives is shared with the assimilated hero
The assimilated hero can release itself to deal 300 damage to enemies in a 700 area of effect

name: Lina
details: Changes damage type from Magical to Pure
Pierces Spell Immunity

name: Lion
details: Increases damage from 600 / 725 / 850 to 725 / 875 / 1025
Decreases mana cost from 200 / 420 / 650 to 200 / 420 / 625
Decreases cooldown from 160 / 100 / 40 to 100 / 60 / 20
Hits all enemy units within 325 radius of the primary target

name: Lone Druid
details: Allows the Spirit Bear to attack at any range from Lone Druid
Prevents Spirit Bear from dying if Lone Druid dies

name: Luna
details: Increases number of Lucent Beams from 5 / 8 / 11 to 6 / 12 / 18
Increases maximum number of hits per target from 5 to Unlimited
Decreases beam interval from 0.6 to 0.3
Decreases duration from 2.4 / 4.2 / 6 to 1.8 / 3.6 / 5.4
Allows Eclipse to be cast on an ally or area within 2500 range, and grants 675 ground vision of the area

name: Magnus
details: Shockwave comes back, hitting units a second time and applying a 60% slow for 2 seconds
Distance and travel speed are increased by 50%
Return wave deals half damage to creeps

name: Medusa
details: Causes Mystic Snake to turn enemies into stone for 1 second
Increases by 0.2 seconds per bounce

name: Meepo
details: Increases number of Meepos from 2 / 3 / 4 to 3 / 4 / 5
Always provides an extra Meepo even if Divided We Stand is not leveled

name: Mirana
details: Passively triggers Starstorm every 9 seconds
If there are no units to affect, the spell waits until there is a nearby enemy

name: Morphling
details: Grants the Hybrid ability
Allows Morphling to target an ally, creating a visually different a hybrid illusion which can be seen by enemies
This hybrid illusion can cast non-ultimate abilities and has Morphling's original attributes

name: Naga Siren
details: Song of the Siren Regenerates you and nearby allies by 10% of maximum HP per second for the duration

name: Nature's Prophet
details: Increases Wrath of Nature initial damage from 110 / 140 / 170 to 135 / 170 / 205
Spawns a Nature's Call treant whenever a unit dies within 4 seconds of being hit by Wrath of Nature
Killing a hero will spawn a Greater Treant with 300% the damage and health of a normal one

name: Necrophos
details: Decreases Reaper's Scythe cooldown from 100 / 85 / 70 to 55 / 40 / 25

name: Night Stalker
details: Grants Night Stalker flying vision at night
This is independent from Darkness and will always be active at night

name: Nyx Assassin
details: Grants the Burrow ability
While burrowed Nyx Assassin has 40% damage resistance and regenerates 1.5% of maximum HP/Mana per second
His spells also receive the following bonuses while burrowed:
Mana Burn and Impale have 75% increased cast range
Impale cooldown is reduced from 13 to 7
Spiked Carapace instantly stuns any enemy units within a 300 area of effect

name: Ogre Magi
details: Grants the Unrefined Fireblast ability
Costs 60% of current mana, so Ogre Magi always has enough mana to cast this spell even at 0 mana

name: Omniknight
details: Increases Guardian Angel duration from 6 / 7 / 8 to 8 / 9 / 10
Increases Guardian Angelradius from 600 to global
Guardian Angel also affects buildings

name: Oracle
details: Reduces Purifying Flames cooldown from 2.25 seconds to 1 second
Lowers cast point from 0.3 to 0.1

name: Outworld Devourer
details: Grants 2 charges to Astral Imprisonment and increases cast range by 300
Damage areas stack
Replenish Time: 12

name: Phantom Lancer
details: Causes Spirit Lance to bounce on nearby enemies
Bounce Range: 400
Bounce Cap: 5

name: Phoenix
details: Increases attacks needed to destroy the Supernova from 5 / 8 / 11 to 7 / 10 / 13
Allows Supernova to be cast on an allied hero, bringing both into the Sun to be reborn together
Has a 500 cast range and if the Sun is destroyed, both heroes will die

name: Puck
details: Increases Dream Coil break damage from 100 / 150 / 200 to 200 / 250 / 300
Increases Dream Coil break stun duration from 1.5 / 2.25 / 3 to 1.5 / 3 / 4.5
Increases Dream Coil duration from 6 to 8
Stun pierces Spell Immunity

name: Pudge
details: Reduces  Meat Hook cooldown from 14 / 13 / 12 / 11 to 4
Increases damage from 90 / 180 / 270 / 360 to 180 / 270 / 360 / 450

name: Pugna
details: Increases Life Drain health/mana drain per second from 150 / 200 / 250 to 180 / 240 / 300
Decreases cooldown from 22 to 0

name: Queen of Pain
details: Increases Sonic Wave damage from 290 / 380 / 470 to 325 / 440 / 555
Decreases cooldown from 135 to 40

name: Razor
details: Decreases time between strikes of Eye of the Storm from 0.7 / 0.6 / 0.5 to 0.6 / 0.5 / 0.4
Allows Eye of the Storm to damage buildings

name: Riki
details: Allows you to target an allied hero, hiding inside them for the duration
The attack radius follows the allied hero
1000 Cast Range
Increases ultimate duration by 4 seconds

name: Rubick
details: Stolen ultimates will always have the Aghanim's Scepter upgrade
Reduces cooldown from 20 / 18 / 16 to 2
Increases cast range from 1000 to 1400

name: Sand King
details: Increases Burrowstrike cast range from 350 / 450 / 550 / 650 to 700 / 900 / 1100 / 1300
Applies Caustic Finale poison to heroes hit by Burrowstrike

name: Shadow Demon
details: Replaces Demonic Purge 50 second cooldown with 3 charges that each have a 40 second replenish time
Applies Break to the target

name: Shadow Fiend
details: Increases Necromastery max souls from 15 / 22 / 29 / 36 to 22 / 30 / 38 / 46
Requiem of Souls waves now return back to Shadow Fiend dealing 40% damage on the way back
All of the damage the Requiem does to heroes on its way back heals Shadow Fiend

name: Shadow Shaman
details: Causes Serpent Wards to have a split shot, attacking two units each for full damage
Increases Serpent Ward attack range from 600 to 825

name: Silencer
details: Glaives of Wisdom now Pierce Spell Immunity and deal 100% more damage against Silenced units

name: Skywrath Mage
details: Anytime Skywrath Mage casts an ability, a different random nearby target within 700 range will be hit with the same ability (heroes prioritized)

name: Slark
details: Causes Shadow Dance active to be a 325 radius, hiding allied heroes underneath it
Reduces ultimate cooldown from 60 to 30

name: Sniper
details: Assassinate becomes a ground targeted spell with a 400 radius which locks onto the targets in the area upon cast
Damage changes to a physical 2.8× critical strike based on Sniper's attack
Procs headshot on hit

name: Spirit Breaker
details: Increases Nether Strike cast range from 700 to 850  Decreases cooldown from 60 to 20
Applies the current level of Greater Bash to all units within a 250 radius

name: Storm Spirit
details: Causes Electric Vortex to be a 475 radius ability around Storm Spirit
Requires vision over the units to affect them

name: Sven
details: God's Strength grants an allied aura within a 900 radius
Aura grants allies 75% / 100% / 125% bonus base damage

name: Techies
details: Increases Remote Mines damage from 300 / 450 / 600 to 450 / 600 / 750
Increases cast range from 500 to 700
Minefield Sign makes all Proximity Mines, Stasis Traps and Remote Mines within a 125 radius immune to True Sight

name: Tidehunter
details: Causes Gush to become a ground targeted wave ability that travels for 1800 range, hitting enemies in a 240 radius of the wave

name: Timbersaw
details: Grants Timbersaw a second Chakram

name: Tinker
details: Laser refracts to visible enemy heroes within a 650 bounce range
Increases Heat-Seeking Missile's number of targets from 2 to 4

name: Tiny
details: Increases damage on tossed units from 35% / 50% / 65% to 50% / 65% / 80%
Increases Tiny's attack range from 128 to 235
Adds a passive 50% cleave within 400 range
Deals 175% damage to buildings

name: Treant Protector
details: Grants the Eyes In The Forest ability
Allows Treant Protector to enchant trees with flying vision and deal a damaging Overgrowth within their sight whenever Overgrowth is cast

name: Tusk
details: Grants the Walrus Kick ability
Kicks the target back 1400 units and slows by 40% for 4 seconds  Deals 350 magical damage

name: Underlord
details: Atrophy Aura's bonus damage is now granted to nearby allied heroes for half of the bonuses
Increases bonus damage duration by 40 seconds

name: Undying
details: Increases Decay's strength steal from 4 to 10

name: Ursa
details: Enrage can now be cast while disabled
Reduces Enrage cooldown from 50 / 40 / 30 to 30 / 24 / 18

name: Vengeful Spirit
details: Allows Vengeful Spirit to target non-hero units with Nether Swap
Decreases cooldown from 45 to 10
On death a Vengeance Illusion spawns that can use all of Vengeful Spirit's abilities, but not items

name: Venomancer
details: Increases Poison Nova damage per second from 30 / 55 / 80 to 60 / 85 / 110
Decreases cooldown from 140 / 120 / 100 to 140 / 120 / 60

name: Viper
details: Increases Viper Strike cast range from 500 to 900
Decreases cooldown from 80 / 50 / 30 to 10
Decreases mana cost from 125 / 175 / 250 to 125

name: Visage
details: Increases number of familiars summoned from 2 to 3

name: Warlock
details: Increases the number of golems summoned from 1 to 2
Each golem's health and damage is reduced to 75%
Each golem's gold bounty is reduced to 50%

name: Weaver
details: Time Lapse cooldown reduced from 60 / 50 / 40 to 16
Time Lapse can now target allied heroes within 1000 range

name: Windranger
details: Auto attack damage reduction for Focus Fire decreased from 50% / 40% / 30% to 30% / 15% / 0%
Decreases cooldown from 60 to 15

name: Winter Wyvern
details: Causes Arctic Burn to be a toggle that drains 40 mana per second
No longer has limit on number of attacks per target

name: Witch Doctor
details: Death Ward's attacks bounce 4 times
Death Ward now has True Strike

name: Wraith King
details: Allies who are slain within a 1200 radius of Wraith King become Wraiths for 7 seconds, delaying their death
They can continue attacking, casting, and using items until the duration ends and the hero dies

name: Zeus
details: Grants the Nimbus ability
Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on the closest enemy within range
